name: lescued - A System for Generating Preferred Music Using AI
description: lescued is a music composition AI that generates the "desired music" for users without the need for verbalization. This is achieved by the AI learning the user's preferences and providing the generated music during this process. By offering this mechanism as an application, users can directly access the music they need.
